arez

Interface Spy


  • public interface Spy
    Interface for interacting with spy system.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • addSpyEventHandler

        void addSpyEventHandler(@Nonnull
                        SpyEventHandler handler)
        Add a spy handler to the list of handlers. The handler should not already be in the list.
        Parameters:
        handler - the spy handler.

      • removeSpyEventHandler

        void removeSpyEventHandler(@Nonnull
                           SpyEventHandler handler)
        Remove spy handler from list of existing handlers. The handler should already be in the list.
        Parameters:
        handler - the spy handler.

      • willPropagateSpyEvents

        boolean willPropagateSpyEvents()
        Return true if spy events will be propagated. This means spies are enabled and there is at least one spy event handler present.
        Returns:
        true if spy events will be propagated, false otherwise.

      • reportSpyEvent

        void reportSpyEvent(@Nonnull
                    Object event)
        Report an event in the Arez system.
        Parameters:
        event - the event that occurred.

      • isTransactionActive

        boolean isTransactionActive()
        Return true if there is a transaction active.
        Returns:
        true if there is a transaction active.

      • getTransaction

        @Nonnull
TransactionInfo getTransaction()
        Return the current transaction. This method should not be invoked unless isTransactionActive() returns true.
        Returns:
        the current transaction.

      • isComputing

        boolean isComputing(@Nonnull
                    ComputedValue<?> computedValue)
        Return true if the specified ComputedValue is "computing". This implies that the current transaction or one of the parent transactions is calculating the ComputedValue at the moment.
        Parameters:
        computedValue - the ComputedValue.
        Returns:
        true if there is a transaction active.

      • isActive

        boolean isActive(@Nonnull
                 ComputedValue<?> computedValue)
        Return true if the ComputedValue is active. A ComputedValue is active if there is one or more Observers and the value will be calculated.
        Parameters:
        computedValue - the ComputedValue.
        Returns:
        true if the ComputedValue is active.

      • getObservers

        @Nonnull
List<ObserverInfo> getObservers(@Nonnull
                                         ComputedValue<?> computedValue)
        Return the list of observers for ComputedValue. The list is an immutable copy of the observers of the ComputedValue.
        Parameters:
        computedValue - the ComputedValue.
        Returns:
        the list of observers for ComputedValue.

      • getDependencies

        @Nonnull
List<ObservableInfo> getDependencies(@Nonnull
                                              ComputedValue<?> computedValue)
        Return the list of dependencies of the ComputedValue. The list is an immutable copy of the dependencies of the ComputedValue. If the ComputedValue is currently being computed (i.e. isComputing(ComputedValue) returns true) then the dependencies are provisional and may be added to as transaction completes.
        Parameters:
        computedValue - the ComputedValue.
        Returns:
        the list of dependencies for ComputedValue.

      • isComputedValue

        boolean isComputedValue(@Nonnull
                        Observable<?> observable)
        Return true if the Observable is a ComputedValue.
        Parameters:
        observable - the Observable.
        Returns:
        true if the Observable is a ComputedValue.

      • asComputedValue

        ComputedValueInfo asComputedValue(@Nonnull
                                  Observable<?> observable)
        Convert the Observable to a ComputedValue. This method should only be called if isComputedValue(Observable) returns true.
        Parameters:
        observable - the Observable.
        Returns:
        the ComputedValue instance.

      • getObservers

        @Nonnull
List<ObserverInfo> getObservers(@Nonnull
                                         Observable<?> observable)
        Return the list of observers for the Observable. The list is an immutable copy of the observers of the Observable.
        Parameters:
        observable - the Observable.
        Returns:
        the list of observers for Observable.

      • isRunning

        boolean isRunning(@Nonnull
                  Observer observer)
        Return true if the Observer is currently running.
        Parameters:
        observer - the Observer.
        Returns:
        true if the Observer is currently running.
        See Also:
        ObserverInfo.isRunning()

      • isScheduled

        boolean isScheduled(@Nonnull
                    Observer observer)
        Return true if the Observer is scheduled to run.
        Parameters:
        observer - the Observer.
        Returns:
        true if the Observer is scheduled to run.
        See Also:
        ObserverInfo.isScheduled()

      • isComputedValue

        boolean isComputedValue(@Nonnull
                        Observer observer)
        Return true if the Observer is a ComputedValue.
        Parameters:
        observer - the Observer.
        Returns:
        true if the Observer is a ComputedValue.
        See Also:
        ObserverInfo.isComputedValue()

      • isReadOnly

        boolean isReadOnly(@Nonnull
                   Observer observer)
        Return true if the Observer will use a read-only transaction.
        Parameters:
        observer - the Observer.
        Returns:
        true if the Observer will use a read-only transaction.
        See Also:
        ObserverInfo.isReadOnly()

      • asComputedValue

        ComputedValueInfo asComputedValue(@Nonnull
                                  Observer observer)
        Convert the Observer to a ComputedValue. This method should only be called if isComputedValue(Observer) returns true.
        Parameters:
        observer - the Observer.
        Returns:
        the ComputedValue instance.
        See Also:
        ObserverInfo.asComputedValue()

      • getDependencies

        @Nonnull
List<ObservableInfo> getDependencies(@Nonnull
                                              Observer observer)
        Return the list of dependencies of the Observer. The list is an immutable copy of the dependencies of the Observer. If the Observer is currently running (i.e. isRunning(Observer) returns true) then the dependencies are provisional and may be added to as transaction completes.
        Parameters:
        observer - the Observer.
        Returns:
        the list of dependencies for the Observer.
        See Also:
        ObserverInfo.getDependencies()

      • getComponent

        @Nullable
ComponentInfo getComponent(@Nonnull
                                     Observable<?> observable)
        Return the component for specified Observable. This method should not be invoked if Arez.areNativeComponentsEnabled() returns false.
        Parameters:
        observable - the Observable.
        Returns:
        the component that contains Observable if any.

      • getComponent

        @Nullable
ComponentInfo getComponent(@Nonnull
                                     Observer observer)
        Return the component for specified Observer. This method should not be invoked if Arez.areNativeComponentsEnabled() returns false.
        Parameters:
        observer - the Observer.
        Returns:
        the component that contains Observer if any.
        See Also:
        ObserverInfo.getComponent()

      • getComponent

        @Nullable
ComponentInfo getComponent(@Nonnull
                                     ComputedValue<?> computedValue)
        Return the component for specified ComputedValue. This method should not be invoked if Arez.areNativeComponentsEnabled() returns false.
        Parameters:
        computedValue - the ComputedValue.
        Returns:
        the component that contains ComputedValue if any.

      • findComponent

        @Nullable
ComponentInfo findComponent(@Nonnull
                                      String type,
                                      @Nonnull
                                      Object id)
        Find the component identified by the specified type and id.
        Parameters:
        type - the component type.
        id - the component id. Should be null if the component is a singleton.
        Returns:
        the component descriptor matching the specified type and id.

      • findAllComponentsByType

        @Nonnull
Collection<ComponentInfo> findAllComponentsByType(@Nonnull
                                                           String type)
        Find all the components identified by the specified type. This collection returned is unmodifiable.
        Parameters:
        type - the component type.
        Returns:
        the collection of component descriptors of specified type.

      • findAllComponentTypes

        @Nonnull
Collection<String> findAllComponentTypes()
        Find all the component types in the system. This is essentially all the types that have at least 1 instance. This collection returned is unmodifiable.
        Returns:
        the collection of component types.

      • findAllTopLevelObservables

        @Nonnull
Collection<ObservableInfo> findAllTopLevelObservables()
        Find all the collection of observables not contained by a native component. This method should not be invoked unless Arez.areRegistriesEnabled() returns true. This collection returned is unmodifiable.
        Returns:
        the collection of observables not contained by a native component.

      • findAllTopLevelObservers

        @Nonnull
Collection<ObserverInfo> findAllTopLevelObservers()
        Find all the collection of observers not contained by a native component. This method should not be invoked unless Arez.areRegistriesEnabled() returns true. This collection returned is unmodifiable.
        Returns:
        the collection of observers not contained by a native component.

      • findAllTopLevelComputedValues

        @Nonnull
Collection<ComputedValueInfo> findAllTopLevelComputedValues()
        Find all the collection of computed values not contained by a native component. This method should not be invoked unless Arez.areRegistriesEnabled() returns true. This collection returned is unmodifiable.
        Returns:
        the collection of computed values not contained by a native component.

      • hasAccessor

        <T> boolean hasAccessor(@Nonnull
                        Observable<T> observable)
        Return true if the specified Observable has an accessor. This method should not be invoked if Arez.arePropertyIntrospectorsEnabled() returns false.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the value that is observable.
        Parameters:
        observable - the Observable.
        Returns:
        true if an accessor is available.

      • getValue

        @Nullable
<T> T getValue(@Nonnull
                         Observable<T> observable)
                  throws Throwable
        Return the value of the specified Observable. This method should only be invoked if Arez.arePropertyIntrospectorsEnabled() returns true and hasAccessor(Observable) for the same element returns true.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the value that is observable.
        Parameters:
        observable - the Observable.
        Returns:
        the value of the observable.
        Throws:
        Throwable - if the property accessor throws an exception.

      • hasMutator

        <T> boolean hasMutator(@Nonnull
                       Observable<T> observable)
        Return true if the specified Observable has a mutator. This method should not be invoked if Arez.arePropertyIntrospectorsEnabled() returns false.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the value that is observable.
        Parameters:
        observable - the Observable.
        Returns:
        true if a mutator is available.

      • setValue

        <T> void setValue(@Nonnull
                  Observable<T> observable,
                  @Nullable
                  T value)
           throws Throwable
        Set the value of the specified Observable. This method should only be invoked if Arez.arePropertyIntrospectorsEnabled() returns true and hasMutator(Observable) for the same element returns true.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the value that is observable.
        Parameters:
        observable - the Observable.
        value - the value to set
        Throws:
        Throwable - if the property accessor throws an exception.

      • getValue

        @Nullable
<T> T getValue(@Nonnull
                         ComputedValue<T> computedValue)
                  throws Throwable
        Return the value of the specified ComputedValue. This method should only be invoked if Arez.arePropertyIntrospectorsEnabled() returns true.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the value that is computed.
        Parameters:
        computedValue - the ComputedValue.
        Returns:
        the value of the ComputedValue.
        Throws:
        Throwable - if the property accessor throws an exception.

      • asComponentInfo

        @Nonnull
ComponentInfo asComponentInfo(@Nonnull
                                       Component component)
        Convert the specified observer into an ObserverInfo.
        Parameters:
        component - the Component.
        Returns:
        the ObservableInfo wrapping observable.

      • asObserverInfo

        @Nonnull
ObserverInfo asObserverInfo(@Nonnull
                                     Observer observer)
        Convert the specified observer into an ObserverInfo.
        Parameters:
        observer - the Observer.
        Returns:
        the ObservableInfo wrapping observable.

        @Nonnull
<T> ObservableInfo asObservableInfo(@Nonnull
                                             Observable<T> observable)
        Convert the specified observable into an ObservableInfo.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the value that is observable.
        Parameters:
        observable - the Observable.
        Returns:
        the ObservableInfo wrapping observable.

      • asComputedValueInfo

        @Nonnull
<T> ComputedValueInfo asComputedValueInfo(@Nonnull
                                                   ComputedValue<T> computedValue)
        Convert the specified computedValue into an ComputedValueInfo.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the value that is computed.
        Parameters:
        computedValue - the ComputedValue.
        Returns:
        the ComputedValueInfo wrapping the computedValue.
